info.title: NeoPOP Wii
info.author: softdev, Wxcvn, Drack, eke-eke, Askot
info.details:
Wiimote Support added by TheStripper
	NeoPop emulates the SNK NeoGeo Pocket handheld console. 
	It is based on NeoPop/SDL by neopopUK and ported to the 
	Nintendo GameCube by The "Genesis Plus" Team. 
	It has been converted from a PC based platform to run on 
	the GameCube's proprietary PPC Gekko processor and features 
	customized code to give you the best gaming experience possible.
